Shopify Review Standalone Section

Learn how to create a Review Standalone section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The "Review Standalone" section is designed to seamlessly integrate customer reviews into your Shopify store's pages. This section allows you to prominently feature text reviews, complete with star ratings, and citation details. It is highly customizable, enabling you to adjust fonts, colors, dimensions, and alignment to match your store's design aesthetic. Perfect for building trust and enhancing the credibility of your products, this section ensures that customer reviews are not just buried in product pages but can be strategically placed anywhere on your site.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Review Standalone"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Product Pages:

    • Highlight top reviews directly on the product page to build confidence in prospective buyers.

  2. Home Page:

    • Feature standout reviews on the homepage to immediately showcase customer satisfaction and build trust.

  3. About Us Page:

    • Use customer testimonials to emphasize your brand's reliability and the quality of your products or services.

  4. Blog Posts:

    • Embed reviews within relevant blog posts to provide social proof and engage readers more effectively.

  5. Landing Pages:

    • Place reviews strategically on landing pages for marketing campaigns to enhance conversion rates.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  1. Text Settings:

    • Text Font: Choose the font family for the review text.
    • Text Size: Set the size of the review text (from 10px to 50px).
    • Citation Font: Choose the font family for the citation text.
    • Citation Size: Set the size of the citation text (from 10px to 50px).

  2. Color Settings:

    • Background Color: Set the background color for the review section.
    • Text Color: Choose the color for the review text.
    • Citation Color: Choose the color for the citation text.
    • Highlight Color: Define the color for highlighted elements such as stars.

  3. Dimension Settings:

    • Max Width of Section: Define the maximum width of the review section.
    • Padding: Configure the padding for the top, bottom, left, and right of the section.
    • Element Spacing: Set the spacing between elements (in pixels).

  4. Review Settings:

    • Alignment: Choose the alignment for the text (left, center, right).
    • Review: Enter the review text to be displayed.
    • Cite: Enter the citation text, typically the name of the reviewer.
